overview: Sequel to My Idiot Brother. This film tells the story of how Angel lives, who moves to Jogja after graduating from school to continue her studies. There he meets Miko who volunteers at Cahaya Harapan. Also in Cahaya Harapan, Angel meets a figure similar to her brother named Andro. Finally, Angel and Miko tried hard to fulfill Andro's dream of playing the keyboard in front of Via Vallen.
title: Angel: Kami Semua Punya Mimpi
